org.gearvrf.x3d.data_types

Class SFRotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • AxisAngle4f
      • org.gearvrf.x3d.data_types.SFRotation

  • public class SFRotation
extends AxisAngle4f
    Defines the X3D SFRotation data type in AxisAngle format Angles in radians
